summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the development of a visual representation of the proposed monorail system and station or stations in the downtown commercial core; increasing the 2002 Budget of the Seattle Planning Commission by making a reimbursable appropriation from the Supplemental Appropriation Account of the Emergency Subfund to finance such representation; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
vote: 4-4 (Yes: Compton, McIver, Pageler, Steinbrueck; No: Conlin, Drago, Licata, Nicastro; Excused: Wills)
